li.label: archotech emanation
li.description: These thoughts coming from the structure, they open doors to such vastness... I feel so small that I might disappear.

li.label: archotech emanation
li.description: I can feel the edge of its wordless whispers... They make me uneasy.

li.label: archotech emanation
li.description: It makes me perceive so much. Eyeless knowledge of absolute existence, all minds speaking and dying and birthing at once. It's hard not to lose connection with myself.

li.label: archotech emanation
li.description: It pays no attention to me but I sense the edge of its perception. Flashes of terrifying timeless sight. Hard to ignore.

li.label: archotech emanation
li.description: The scale of it. The fractal logic-scape of the multiversal hyperplane. No distance. No time. No me or them. I'm everything. I'm nothing.

li.label: archotech emanation
li.description: I can feel the edge of its thoughts, see the endless scope when I close my eyes. I need to focus on my physical body or I drift away.
